* \[[`315020a61a`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/315020a61a)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** **fix(express)**: 2 crashes when `router[method]()` is used with no handler (Ilyas Shabi) [#6908](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/6908)
